name: ACE
text:
Service Change  Posted: 07/08/2018  5:13PM

Northbound [C] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Cathedral Pkwy (110 St).

Delays  Posted: 07/08/2018  2:44PM

Southbound [A] [C] and [D] trains are running with delays because of track maintenance between 125 St and 59 St-Columbus Circle.

Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 9:45 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
World Trade Center-bound [E] trains skip Briarwood and 75 Av in Queens


For service to these stations, take the [E] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and transfer
to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] or Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from Briarwood, take the [E] to Jamaica-Van Wyck, and transfer
to a World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from 75 Av, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke and transfer
to a World Trade Center-bound [E].




Planned Work
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jul 7 - 8, Saturday & Sunday
Euclid Av-bound [C] trains skip 116, 103, 96 and 81 Sts in Manhattan


For service to these stations, take the [C] to 59 St-Columbus Circle and transfer to a 168 St-bound [C].

For service from these stations, take the [C] to 125 St and transfer to a Euclid Av-bound [C].

Alternate travel note:
Use nearby [1] stations instead via transfer at 59 St-Columbus Circle.

Note: Cathedral Pkwy (110 St), 86 St and 72 St are closed for renovation.

Reminder: [C] trains do not operate overnight.




Planned Work
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad1] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.
